titles.title: To establish a director of anti-trafficking policies in the Department of Defense.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 4/29/2010--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Defense (DOD) to designate a director of anti-trafficking policies, to oversee the implementation within DOD of policies relating to trafficking in persons. Outlines related director duties.
